title: Ella Littwitz
text: Ella Littwitz (born 1982) is an <a href="Israelis">Israeli</a> artist, living and working in <a href="Jaffa">Jaffa</a>, <a href="Israel">Israel</a>. Littwitz graduated with <a href="Bachelor%20of%20Fine%20Arts">BFA</a> from <a href="Bezalel%20Academy%20of%20Art%20and%20Design">Bezalel Academy of Art and Design</a> in 2009.
